resources.string: We used Autism AI (available on Google Playstore) as an inspiration for calmOmatic. Addressing mental health is very important hence the development of calmOmatic, a great gaming experience \n coated with stress relief tips and quotes. We hope this is an enjoyable experience for you all.\n" http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rezanet.intelligentasdscreener
